summary: Tomax and Xamot are here to show the Dark Brotherhood where it\'s really at.
descriptionHtml:
Just a simple and silly mod I made in a morning, teaching myself how to retexture armor.

I modified the regular DB armor and made two sets: one for my character Tomax, and one for his twin brother Xamot (I used BravoOskar\'s fabulous NPC creation tutorial to make my twin clone).  They\'re just the cuirasses (I use the regular DB gloves and boots) and they\'re unenchanted because I prefer to use my own enchantments.  I should also mention that they\'re standalone, and won\'t retexture the existing DB members\' armors.

Male only, since, well, Tomax and Xamot are both male (wearing Tomax or Xamot\'s armor as a female will just show the regular DB armor).

Simply extract the contents of the .zip file to your Skyrim\\Data directory.

Ref IDs:
Tomax\'s armor:  XX000D62
Xamot\'s armor:  XX000D63
(where XX is your mod load order)

Again, this was a quick and dirty retex for my personal use.  There are issues with it, but I probably won\'t fix them.  Feel free to do so yourself.  

In other [more official] words, you are free to use this \"mod\" (and I use the term loosely) for whatever you\'d like (oh, but please don\'t upload it to the Steam Workshop.  They suck).

Thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim and to Hasbro for G.I. Joe  :-)
And thanks to BravoOskar for his NPC tutorial (you can find it here on the Nexus).
author: imperium999
